Question_Text.remote: To ask the Secretary of State for Justice, what steps the Government has taken to create a national process to co-ordinate the collection and dissemination of all forced marriage protection orders and female genital mutilation protection orders.
Answer_Text.remote: We are aware that HM Inspectorate of Constabulary has recommended the creation of such a process. Officials from the Ministry of Justice and the Home Office FGM Unit are working with the Police to consider how best to respond.
